server.data

Class VotingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.data.VotingManager

  • public class VotingManager
extends Object
    Class for managing voting processes ("voting" database collection) and user votes ("votingusers" database collection).
    Author:
    soleksiy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VotingManager(DatabaseManager dbm, UserManager um) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeTimeConstraintVotings(ChangeManager changeManager, CloudFactory cloudFactory, FileManager fileManager)
      This will close time-constrained voting processes, so that the method listVotingClosedNotifications could pick up the closed votings.
      com.mongodb.BasicDBList listOpenVotes(String userUid)
      Lists the voting processes where the given user is a participant
      com.mongodb.BasicDBList listVotingClosedNotifications(String initiatorUid, ChangeManager changeManager, CloudStorage dropbox)
      List notifications of closed voting processes.
      com.mongodb.BasicDBList listVotingRequests(String userUid)
      Lists the votes where a given user has not voted yet
      void removeVoting(long votingID)
      Removes information about the voting process from the voting collection, based on the votingID -- the voting process ID Could be useful -- when initiator removes it from the notification list.
      void removeVotingUsers(long votingID)
      Removes information from the votingusers collection based on the votingID -- the voting process ID Could be useful in removevoting?votingID=id
      boolean vote(VotingInput votingInput, CloudStorage dropbox, ChangeManager changeManager, FileManager fileManager)
      Gets VotingInput.

      • listOpenVotes

        public com.mongodb.BasicDBList listOpenVotes(String userUid)
        Lists the voting processes where the given user is a participant
        Parameters:
        userUid - User UID
        Returns:
        BSON list of open voting process IDs.

      • listVotingRequests

        Lists the votes where a given user has not voted yet
        Parameters:
        userUid - User UID
        Returns:
        BSON list of votes where the user has not voted yet.

      • closeTimeConstraintVotings

        public void closeTimeConstraintVotings(ChangeManager changeManager,
                              CloudFactory cloudFactory,
                              FileManager fileManager)
        This will close time-constrained voting processes, so that the method listVotingClosedNotifications could pick up the closed votings.
        Parameters:
        changeManager -
        cloudFactory -
        fileManager -

      • vote

        public boolean vote(VotingInput votingInput,
           CloudStorage dropbox,
           ChangeManager changeManager,
           FileManager fileManager)
        Gets VotingInput. Evaluates whether the voting process is cancelled or can be closed. If it is cancelled, reverts the change. If it can be closed, accepts or rejects it based on the voting scheme.
        Parameters:
        votingInput - Information about the voting process
        dropbox -
        changeManager -
        fileManager -
        Returns:
        True if success, false if error.

      • removeVotingUsers

        public void removeVotingUsers(long votingID)
        Removes information from the votingusers collection based on the votingID -- the voting process ID Could be useful in removevoting?votingID=id
        Parameters:
        votingID - Voting process ID

      • removeVoting

        public void removeVoting(long votingID)
        Removes information about the voting process from the voting collection, based on the votingID -- the voting process ID Could be useful -- when initiator removes it from the notification list.
        Parameters:
        votingID -
